# Hierchical Cluster

## Dissimilarity Measure: Euclidean Distance
```{r}
matrix <- as.matrix(data_sub)
matrix <- t(matrix)

# distance between patients
row_distance = dist(matrix, method = "euclidean")

fviz_nbclust(matrix, FUN = kmeans, method = "wss")
fviz_nbclust(matrix, FUN = hcut, method = "wss")


fviz_nbclust(matrix, FUN = kmeans, method = "gap_stat")
fviz_nbclust(matrix, FUN = hcut, method = "gap_stat")

```

### Ward
```{r}
# try different linkage
hc.ward = hclust(d = row_distance, method = "ward.D")

png("/Users/czang/Documents/2020Fall/2079ML/project/BIOST2079/output/hierchical_ward_euclidean_3cluster.png", width = 1500, height = 1000, res=220)
fviz_dend(
  hc.ward,
  k = 3,
  cex = 0.3,
  palette = "jco",
  color_labels_by_k = TRUE,
  rect = TRUE,
  rect_fill = TRUE,
  rect_border = "jco",
  labels_track_height = 3.5
)
dev.off()

# hc_label<-cutree(hc.ward, k = 3)

```
